list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: lower and raise one's head slightly and briefly, especially in greeting, assent, or understanding, or to give someone a signal.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she nodded her head in agreement

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: have one's head fall forward when drowsy or asleep.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Anna gật đầu trên cuốn sách của mình

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: an act of nodding the head.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: at a nod from his father he left the room
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Khi gật đầu từ cha anh rời khỏi phòng
